item.description:
Hi Folks,

Join me for an Indian dinner. We'll order a variety of food, pass it around family style, and then split the food portion of the bill evenly. Everyone will pay for their own drinks separately.

If you're a fussy eater, then this may not be for you because the food will be passed around and you may not know what ends up on your plate! C'mon, be adventurous!

And anyone with food allergies, special diets or vegetarians may not want to join us for this event because some of the food we order may have nuts, meat, shellfish, etc .... Just letting everyone know what to expect, so you can make an informed decision.

Please be 99.9% sure you can make it if you reply yes because a reservation has been made.

Check out the restaurant's website for more info:

http://www.cafeofindi...

I plan to take the Red Line to Harvard Square.

Check out the public transportation info:

http://www.mbta.com/...

Please bring cash.

Cheers!

Lisa

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Indian Dinner
